Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-26158 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-22
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-26158 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.36.1-22. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.36.1-22, affected by CVE-2026-26158
